How This API Document Is Organized

本API文档的组织方式

This API (Application Programming Interface) document has pages corresponding to the items in the navigation bar, described as follows.
本API（应用程序编程接口）文档包含与导航栏中项目对应的页面，具体说明如下。

  • Overview

    概述

    The Overview page is the front page of this API document and provides a list of all packages with a summary for each. This page can also contain an overall description of the set of packages.

    概述页面是本API文档的首页，提供了所有包的列表及其各自的摘要。该页面还可能包含包集合的整体描述。

  • Package

    包

    Each package has a page that contains a list of its classes and interfaces, with a summary for each. This page can contain six categories:

    每个包都有一个页面，其中包含其类和接口的列表，以及每个类和接口的摘要。此页面可能包含六个类别：

    • Interfaces (italic)/接口（斜体）
    • Classes/类
    • Enums/枚举
    • Exceptions/异常
    • Errors/错误
    • Annotation Types/注解类型

  • Class/Interface

    类/接口

    Each class, interface, nested class and nested interface has its own separate page. Each of these pages has three sections consisting of a class/interface description, summary tables, and detailed member descriptions:

    每个类、接口、嵌套类和嵌套接口都有其独立的页面。每个页面包含三个部分：类/接口描述、摘要表格和详细的成员描述：

    • Class inheritance diagram/类继承图
    • Direct Subclasses/直接子类
    • All Known Subinterfaces/所有已知的子接口
    • All Known Implementing Classes/所有已知的实现类
    • Class/interface declaration
      类/接口声明
    • Class/interface description
      类/接口描述
    • Nested Class Summary/嵌套类摘要
    • Field Summary/字段摘要
    • Constructor Summary/构造函数摘要
    • Method Summary/方法摘要
    • Field Detail/字段详情
    • Constructor Detail/构造函数详情
    • Method Detail/方法详情

    Each summary entry contains the first sentence from the detailed description for that item. The summary entries are alphabetical, while the detailed descriptions are in the order they appear in the source code. This preserves the logical groupings established by the programmer.

    每个摘要条目包含该项目详细描述的第一句话。摘要条目按字母顺序排列，而详细描述则按照源代码中出现的顺序排列。这保留了程序员建立的逻辑分组。

  • Annotation Type

    注解类型

    Each annotation type has its own separate page with the following sections:

    每个注解类型都有其独立的页面，包含以下部分：

    • Annotation Type declaration
    • 注解类型声明
    • Annotation Type description
    • 注解类型描述
    • Required Element Summary
    • 必需元素摘要
    • Optional Element Summary
    • 可选元素摘要
    • Element Detail
    • 元素详情

  • Enum

    枚举

    Each enum has its own separate page with the following sections:

    每个枚举都有其独立的页面，包含以下部分：

    • Enum declaration
    • 枚举声明
    • Enum description
    • 枚举描述
    • Enum Constant Summary
    • 枚举常量摘要
    • Enum Constant Detail
    • 枚举常量详情

  • Use

    使用

    Each documented package, class and interface has its own Use page. This page describes what packages, classes, methods, constructors and fields use any part of the given class or package. Given a class or interface A, its Use page includes subclasses of A, fields declared as A, methods that return A, and methods and constructors with parameters of type A. You can access this page by first going to the package, class or interface, then clicking on the "Use" link in the navigation bar.

    每个已文档化的包、类和接口都有其独立的使用页面。此页面描述了哪些包、类、方法、构造函数和字段使用了给定类或包的任何部分。对于给定的类或接口A，其使用页面包括A的子类、声明为A类型的字段、返回A的方法，以及带有A类型参数的方法和构造函数。您可以先转到包、类或接口页面，然后点击导航栏中的"Use"链接来访问此页面。

  • Tree (Class Hierarchy)

    树（类层次结构）

    There is a Class Hierarchy page for all packages, plus a hierarchy for each package. Each hierarchy page contains a list of classes and a list of interfaces. The classes are organized by inheritance structure starting with java.lang.Object. The interfaces do not inherit from java.lang.Object.

    系统为所有包提供一个类层次结构页面，同时每个包也有其各自的层次结构。每个层次结构页面包含类列表和接口列表。类按继承结构组织，从java.lang.Object开始。接口不从java.lang.Object继承。

    • When viewing the Overview page, clicking on "Tree" displays the hierarchy for all packages.
    • 在查看概述页面时，点击"Tree"将显示所有包的层次结构。
    • When viewing a particular package, class or interface page, clicking "Tree" displays the hierarchy for only that package.
    • 在查看特定的包、类或接口页面时，点击"Tree"将仅显示该包的层次结构。

  • Deprecated API

    已废弃的API

    The Deprecated API page lists all of the API that have been deprecated. A deprecated API is not recommended for use, generally due to improvements, and a replacement API is usually given. Deprecated APIs may be removed in future implementations.

    已废弃的API页面列出了所有已被废弃的API。不建议使用已废弃的API，这通常是由于有了改进，且通常会提供替代的API。已废弃的API可能会在未来的实现中被移除。

  • Index

    索引

    The Index contains an alphabetic list of all classes, interfaces, constructors, methods, and fields.

    索引包含所有类、接口、构造函数、方法和字段的字母顺序列表。

  • Prev/Next

    上一页/下一页

    These links take you to the next or previous class, interface, package, or related page.

    这些链接可带您到下一个或上一个类、接口、包或相关页面。

  • Frames/No Frames

    框架/无框架

    These links show and hide the HTML frames. All pages are available with or without frames.

    这些链接用于显示和隐藏HTML框架。所有页面都可以在有框架或无框架模式下查看。

  • All Classes

    所有类

    The All Classes link shows all classes and interfaces except non-static nested types.

    所有类链接显示所有的类和接口，但不包括非静态嵌套类型。

  • Serialized Form

    序列化形式

    Each serializable or externalizable class has a description of its serialization fields and methods. This information is of interest to re-implementors, not to developers using the API. While there is no link in the navigation bar, you can get to this information by going to any serialized class and clicking "Serialized Form" in the "See also" section of the class description.

    每个可序列化或可外部化的类都有其序列化字段和方法的描述。这些信息对重新实现者有用，而对使用API的开发者则不太重要。虽然导航栏中没有相关链接，但您可以通过转到任何序列化类并点击类描述中"另请参见"部分的"Serialized Form"来获取此信息。

  • Constant Field Values

    常量字段值

    The Constant Field Values page lists the static final fields and their values.

    常量字段值页面列出了静态终态字段及其值。

This help file applies to API documentation generated using the standard doclet. 本帮助文件适用于使用标准doclet生成的API文档。
